titleStmt.title: The great feast at the sheep-shearing of the city and citizens, on the 7th. of Iune last consecrated for an Holy Thursday in memorandum of St. Thomas, and St. Oliver; solemnly holden at the Grocers hall, London, 1649. To the tone or garb of the Counter scuffle.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678, attributed author.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Marchamont Nedham in the Wrenn catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Texas, Austin Library.
